Sentencas: A novel ionic conductor, BaCe0.8Sm0.2O3-delta-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-delta (BCS-SDC, weight ratio 1:1), is reported as an electrolyte material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: A novel electronic current-blocked stable mixed ionic conductor for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Homogeneous BCS-SDC composite powders are synthesized via a one-step gel combustion method.
Titulo: A novel electronic current-blocked stable mixed ionic conductor for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The BCS and SDC crystalline grains play a role as matrix for each other in the composite electrolyte.
Titulo: A novel electronic current-blocked stable mixed ionic conductor for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The composite avoids the typical drawbacks of BCS and SDC, showing not only a better chemical stability than the single phase of BCS but much higher open circuit voltages (OCVs) than the single phase of SDC under the fuel cell conditions.
Titulo: A novel electronic current-blocked stable mixed ionic conductor for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, BCS-SDC exhibits mixed oxygen ionic and protonic conduction.
Titulo: A novel electronic current-blocked stable mixed ionic conductor for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A total conductivity of 0.0204S cm(-1) at 700 degrees C is achieved in wet hydrogen (3% H2O), the value of which is comparable with the state-of-the-art proton conductor BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2O3-delta (BZCY).
Titulo: A novel electronic current-blocked stable mixed ionic conductor for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The peak power density achieves 505 mW cm(-2) at 700 degrees C with a 30-mu m-thick BCS-SDC electrolyte using wet H-2 as the fuel.
Titulo: A novel electronic current-blocked stable mixed ionic conductor for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Resistances of the tested cell under open circuit conditions at different operating temperatures are also investigated by impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: A novel electronic current-blocked stable mixed ionic conductor for solid oxide fuel cells
A novel electronic current-blocked stable mixed ionic conductor for solid oxide fuel cells
A novel electronic current-blocked stable mixed ionic conductor for solid oxide fuel cells
